thread.section_title: London House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good value and location
thread.title_full: Very good value and location - Review of London House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: john h
title: Very good value and location
text: Rooms very clean and recently refurbished with a great shower. We booked two twin rooms which were both better than expected overlooking the gardens. The reception is well laid out with a meeting area and the staff were very friendly. The continental breakfast is excellent value. Both our rooms were also very quite at night.
